text:
Juri, is taking care of the animals
going smoothly?

Yeah, I guess so.
At first, I was a bit unsure what to do...

But they've all become so tame and quiet.
It's a relief.
They're all so clever and well-behaved.

That's true. We came all of a sudden,
they accepted us...

They must know that we're here to take care of them,
even if it's just for today.
Animals are sensitive to those kinds of things.

I see.
Then, I need to take even better care of them.

Ehehe.
Yes! Let's take care of them with all our might!
